creator: Rolla
descriptionHtml:
About the app
Rolla One is a mobile app that tracks your daily fitness-related metrics and gives you health insights. You can use it as a step counter, have a deeper insight into daily activities, or create and participate in various challenges. We hope it will motivate you to live a healthier life.

Track your activity
Rolla One keeps track of your daily activities. Whether real or virtual, all of your activities are saved in one place. Gain insight into your performance during activities. Rolla One will calculate metrics like activity duration, distance, calories, average power and speed, maximum speed, and elevation.

Compete with friends
Create challenges to compete with your friends. You can create two types of challenges - walking and cycling, depending on if you want to count the number of steps, or distance cycled. You can name the challenge whatever you want, set it to be public or private, and choose a time period. Once the challenge is created, invite other contestants.
descriptionShort: Rolla One tracks your fitness-related activities.

descriptionShort: Rolla One tracks your fitness-related activities.
title: Rolla One (Beta)

creator: Rolla
descriptionHtml:
Rolla One is a mobile app that tracks your daily fitness-related metrics and gives you health insights. You can use it as a step counter, have a more in-depth insight into daily activities, or create and participate in various challenges.

MONITOR YOUR HEALTH
No matter what your end fitness goal is, it all comes down to improving your health. Monitor your health with metrics such as weight, heart rate, calories, blood pressure, temperature, and sleep. All these are useful if you want to lead a healthier lifestyle.

TRACK YOUR ACTIVITIES
This app keeps track of your daily activities. Whether real or virtual, all of your activities are saved in one place. Gain insight into your performance during exercise. Rolla One will calculate metrics like the number of steps, active minutes, activity duration, distance, calories, average power and speed, maximum speed, and elevation.

COMPETE WITH OTHERS
Is there a better way to stay motivated and get out of your chair/bed than taking up a healthy challenge? It's proven that group fitness and health challenges release endorphins, strengthen relationships, and support personal well-being. Create individual challenges and compete with others on Rolla. Who's going to have more steps or better heart rate this month?

VIRTUAL ACTIVITIES
Whether indoor exercise is your thing, or outdoor conditions don't allow you to train outside, virtual jogging or cycling in Rolla World is ideal for you. We're sure you'll enjoy our 3D routes as much as you enjoy the real ones. Important: you have to install the Rolla World app on your computer to do virtual activities.

Learn more about Rolla apps: www.rolla.app
descriptionShort: Look into your fitness and health.
title: Rolla One (Beta)

creator: Rolla
descriptionHtml:
Rolla One is an app that tracks your daily fitness-related metrics and gives you health insights. You can use it as a step counter, have a more in-depth insight into daily activities, or create and participate in various challenges.

MONITOR YOUR HEALTH
No matter what your end fitness goal is, it all comes down to improving your health. Monitor your health with metrics such as weight, heart rate, calories, blood pressure, temperature, and sleep. All these are useful if you want to lead a healthier lifestyle.

TRACK YOUR ACTIVITIES
This app keeps track of your daily activities. Whether real or virtual, all of your activities are saved in one place. Gain insight into your performance during exercise. Rolla One will calculate metrics like the number of steps, active minutes, activity duration, distance, calories, average power and speed, maximum speed, and elevation.

COMPETE WITH OTHERS
Is there a better way to stay motivated and get out of your chair/bed than taking up a healthy challenge? It's proven that group fitness and health challenges release endorphins, strengthen relationships, and support personal well-being. Create individual challenges and compete with others on Rolla. Who's going to have more steps or kilometers this month?

VIRTUAL ACTIVITIES
Whether indoor exercise is your thing, or outdoor conditions don't allow you to train outside, virtual jogging or cycling in Rolla World is ideal for you. We're sure you'll enjoy our 3D routes as much as you enjoy the real ones. Important: you have to install the Rolla World app on your computer to do virtual activities.

Own a Wear OS smartwatch?
Download Rolla One and get more out of your watch. Start and control your virtual activities directly from your wrist, or use the watch as a step counter for jogging in Rolla World.


Learn more about Rolla apps: www.rolla.app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed following bugs:
- unknown error during registration
- crash on first activity after registration
- removed speakers from list of displays
- duplicated chromecast devices
- activity dashboard timeout on virtual and outdoor activites
- keyboard not showing inside webview with google fit
- added crashlyitcs
- calculating average speed for outdoor activites
- time deviation depends on device
